name: Lost Space Dragonfly
description:
The 3rd work of the TREE series!!!
　A game of a lost dragonfly!!!

　He's getting lost, doing his best to go home.
　The stage is the infinite universe.
　You can go far and far away.
　Be careful, if you go so far, it takes as much long to go home.

　The perfect collision detect and phisics controlls the perfect interaction.
　All objects and creatures interact with each other.
　But collision size of the dragonfly is made small or the game over comes soon.

　And the monsters are controlled by phisics perfectly so they come to you pushing their way through the stones.
　Many monsters cooperate to exclude stones enclosed by them, so they even look like a large single organism.
　Can you overcome the fear of the monsters doing so even if you hide behind the stones???

　And the bio-locus system is loaded.
　You can watch the flying locus disappearing gracefully like some creatures.

　'Wao wao.'
